wybug_title: 好课网主站一处SQL注入漏洞一
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-14：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-15：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-10-15：	厂商已经修复漏洞并主动公开，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 额。。。注入真的很多，要不要自己先排查一遍。。。 详细说明：  
POST /ajax/course_type/lists_course_type HTTP/1.1Host: www.class.cnProxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 10Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01Origin: http://www.class.cnX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_10_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/45.0.2454.93 Safari/537.36Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedReferer: http://www.class.cn/index/techAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en;q=0.6,pl;q=0.4,zh-TW;q=0.2Cookie: looyu_id=fec916905422df3e1f057a48912b3bb42c_49744%3A1; RESET_PASSWD_COOKIE=1852; lastvisit=1444802936938; 7iDQ_2132_saltkey=17H1MQ05; 7iDQ_2132_lastvisit=1444798914; email=385838661%40qq.com; 7iDQ_2132_sid=hgWSJ5; 7iDQ_2132_lastact=1444803029%09uc.php%09; 7iDQ_2132_auth=5602Lc6UjzEWHj7Q4%2B%2B5wVYvv9yR4jaHEwN6fVd5p1GgOjNGE6CiA4YR5iG2QjyzZwcUXHmTHb0l8zHPAftAdUJn2ynI; eol_auth=2fa09fcd4a72e81ee765217bd90ace3a; eol_userid=1208632; eol_name=%E6%8D%95%E9%B1%BC%E4%B8%8A%E5%88%86%E5%99%A8; eol_email=385838661%40qq.com; open_flag=%DF%5E%BD%DF; recom=1; PHPSESSID=ed516i8ckk6nmmdhjlcpa9cbo7; loginTime=1444817421; CNZZDATA5333700=cnzz_eid%3D401275502-1444651086-%26ntime%3D1444815367; Hm_lvt_5907fb81dedac17075ae6def57dc2989=1444738730,1444738958,1444738989,1444739041; Hm_lpvt_5907fb81dedac17075ae6def57dc2989=1444817903; eol_avd_got=1444817338016110; looyu_49744=v%3Afec916905422df3e1f057a48912b3bb42c%2Cref%3A%2Cr%3A%2Cmon%3Ahttp%3A//m151.looyu.com/monitorparentId=1

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：20  确认时间：2015-10-15 10:52 厂商回复： 全面检查。多谢。 最新状态： 2015-10-15：已修复。
